casebody.data:
NO. CAAP-17-0000848 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. December 28, 2018

The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON fka the Bank of New York, as Successor Trustee to JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., as Trustee for the Holders of SAMI II Trust 2006-AR6, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2006-AR6 Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
James W. WEST; Jo Nyla West, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Mortgage Electronic Registration Systems, Inc. ("MERS"), Solely as Nominee for Countrywide Bank, N.A., Defendants-Appellees,
and
John Does 1-20; Jane Does 1-20; Doe Corporations 1-20; Doe Entities 1-20; and Doe Governmental Units 1-20, Defendants

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Vacated. Remanded.
